sentence.Network_en: The rivers and brooks reticulated the broad plains of the valley, as thickly as veins in marble.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这山谷的广大平原上河流织成了网状, 密密麻麻如同大理石上的纹.

sentence.Network_en: Reticulated shell structures is more and more widely used in long - span structures.
sentence.Network_cn: 网壳结构在大跨度结构中得到越来越广泛的应用.

sentence.Network_en: The basal components: X - joints and single layer ellipsoid reticulated shell were analyzed.
sentence.Network_cn: 本文对弦支穹顶基本组成部分: X 型圆管相贯节点和单层椭球网壳进行了分析研究.
